captions.text: Impresive!
How many can you do?
How many could you do in a row?
Infinite
I don't know...
How do you do it? Show me the trick to it.
Show me the technique so people can see it.
Do you have to touch the ball with the instep? How do you do it?
You have to make sure your foot isn't soft, but rigid.
Marcelo, for example, does it really well
because he lets air out of the ball.
This ball isn't a good one to juggle with.
But you have to keep your foot pretty rigid.
The type of training has changed
because you don't see a skill like this... individual, juggling the ball.
Now it's about speed... it's different.
It's dynamic.
We don't do individual skills like 20 years ago.
You'd be there practising skills, passing...
Now training is about movement.

title: BEHIND THE SCENES: Ancelotti te enseña a dar toques con el balón

comments.text:
CUANTOS PUEDES DAR? 
INFINITO. GRANDE ANCELOTTI﻿

comments.author: Salvatore L.

comments.text:
- how many could you do in a row ?
- infinite...
just carleto :D﻿
comments.author: 009hannibal

comments.text:
Yo soy gran fan del Fútbol, del bueno claro, fan siempre del Madrid. Pero 
también se reconocer buenos equipos y para usos personales me gusta sacar 
lo mejor de ellos. ¿A que va esto? Bueno pues que aun como 100% Madridista 
viendo a El Mister Caletto me recordé... cuando el Barca saco sus videos de 
"Las clases del Barca" me los compré, donde daban clases Rafa Marquez, Etó, 
Deco, Ronaldinho, Maxi, Xabi, Puyol etc... y valla que eran súper buenos, 
me enseñaron mucho. Y quisiera profundamente que ahora que el Madrid está 
en su mejor momento sacara algo similar para nosotros quienes queremos 
mejorar las técnicas de jugar, para nosotros los 100% Madridistas. :D﻿
